children.name: Control flow complexity
children.description: The computational complexity of the control flow structure in the code functions.

children.name: Data flow complexity
children.description: The complexity of the data flow structure in the code functions.

children.name: OO complexity
children.description: The complexity of the object-oriented architecture and structure. Composed of MDIT (maximum depth of inheritance tree).

children.name: Code documentation
children.description: The amount of documentation in the code: comment rate, javadoc, etc.

children.name: Code size
children.description: The overall size of the code.

children.name: Access points
children.description: The amount of attributes and methods on the class, whatever their visibility is.

children.name: Public access points
children.description: Total number of public classes, interfaces, methods, constructors, annotations and attributes.

children.name: SCM Documentation
children.description: Is there some documentation about the SCM process, rules and conventions?

children.name: ITS usage
children.description: How much the ITS system was used during last month. Composed of ITS_ISSUES_OPEN_1M and ITS_ISSUES_OPENERS_1M.

children.name: SCM usage
children.description: How much the SCM system was used during last month. Composed of SCM_COMMITS_1M and SCM_COMMITTERS_1M.

children.name: Code analysability index
children.description: A weighted index of code characteristics that impact analysability.

children.name: Non conformities index for analysability
children.description: Number of non conformities to analysability rules found in the artefact.

children.name: Adherence to analysability rules
children.description: Ratio of conform analysability practices on the number of checked analysability practices.

children.name: Code changeability index
children.description: A weighted index of code characteristics that impact changeability.

children.name: Non conformities index for changeability
children.description: Number of non conformities to changeability rules found in the artefact.

children.name: Adherence to changeability rules
children.description: Ratio of conform changeability practices on the number of checked analysability practices.

children.name: Code reliability index
children.description: A weighted index of code characteristics that impact reliability.

children.name: Non conformities index for reliability
children.description: Number of non conformities to reliability rules found in the artefact.

children.name: Adherence to reliability rules
children.description: Ratio of conform reliability practices on the number of checked analysability practices.

children.name: Code reusability index
children.description: A weighted index of code characteristics that impact reusability.

children.name: Non conformities index for reusability
children.description: Number of non conformities to reusability rules found in the artefact.

children.name: Adherence to reusability rules
children.description: Ratio of conform reliability practices on the number of checked reusability practices.

children.name: ITS Reliability Index
children.description: The reliability assessment of the project regarding registered bugs.

children.name: Test coverage
children.description: What percentage of the product has tests?

children.name: Number of tests
children.description: How much the SCM system was used during last month. Composed of SCM_COMMITS_1M and SCM_COMMITTERS_1M.

children.name: Test success rate
children.description: How much the SCM system was used during last month. Composed of SCM_COMMITS_1M and SCM_COMMITTERS_1M.
